entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
